/* Client-specific Styles and Reset */
#outlook a {
  padding: 0; }

body {
  width: 100% !important;
  min-width: 100%;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0; }

/* .ExternalClass applies to Outlook.com (the artist formerly known as Hotmail)  */
.ExternalClass {
  width: 100%; }
  .ExternalClass,
  .ExternalClass p,
  .ExternalClass span,
  .ExternalClass font,
  .ExternalClass td,
  .ExternalClass div {
    line-height: 100%; }
